snippet: Harlem Lanes, which opened in 2006 to great fanfare, shut down on Sunday, joining other popular local businesses that closed because of economic difficulties.
abstract: Harlem Lanes bowling alley, which opened in 2006 and was an epicenter of Harlem revival, shuts down; business is latest in a string of popular local closings due to the area's economic struggles.
lead_paragraph: Harlem Lanes, which opened in 2006 to great fanfare, shut down on Sunday, joining other popular local businesses that closed because of economic difficulties.

headline.seo: Harlem Lanes Closes, Joining List of Local Businesses Hit by Bad Economy
headline.main: A Common Refrain as Harlem Loses Its Bowling Alley
headline.print_headline: A Common Refrain As Harlem Loses Its Bowling Alley
